attributes.action: Request that King Charles dissolves the Labour Government.
attributes.additional_details:
STOP the boats! Send the migrants back, STOP giving them benefits, housing, clothes.
Cut foreign aid drastically, make energy more affordable again. Don't cut the benefits that the sick and the disabled relay on. After the 2nd World War England rebuilt houses quickly, do that! Use prefabricated houses if you have to, but make it affordable that shop worker or cleaner could afford. Current affordable housing ISNT affordable. Secure our food security, reinstate financial help for our farmers.
attributes.background: Farmers are facing disaster. Pensioners had their heating benefit cut. The sick and the disabled are having their benefits cut. Food and housing costs are sky high. Number of Illegal migrants are increasing but they are getting benefits, food, housing and clothing. Your not listening to us.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions that request actions by the King, as these are decisions for the crown, and not the Government or House of Commons.

You may wish to sign the following:

Increase maritime enforcement to intercept and return boats to France.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700617

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143

Stop all foreign aid
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700263
